required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Study of an Investigational Drug, ALN-TTR02, for the Treatment of Transthyretin (TTR)-Mediated Amyloidosis in Patients Who Have Already Been Treated With ALN-TTR02
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2, Multicenter, Open-Label, Extension Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety, Clinical Activity, and Pharmacokinetics of ALN-TTR02 in Patients With Familial Amyloidotic Polyneuropathy Who Have Previously Received ALN-TTR02

oversight_info.authority: Portugal: National Pharmacy and Medicines Institute
France: Afssaps - Agence française de sécurité sanitaire des produits de santé (Saint-Denis)
Spain: Agencia Española de Medicamentos y Productos Sanitarios
Germany: Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices
United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of long-term dosing with ALN-TTR02 in patients with transthyretin (TTR) mediated amyloidosis (ATTR).

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Safety and tolerability of long-term dosing with ALN-TTR02 in ATTR patients
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 56 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of changes from baseline in serum TTR lowering associated with long-term dosing of ALN-TTR02
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 56 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of changes from baseline in neurologic impairment associated with long-term dosing of ALN-TTR02
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 56 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of changes from baseline in quality of life and disability associated with long-term dosing of ALN-TTR02
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 56 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of changes from baseline in motor function associated with long-term dosing of ALN-TTR02
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 56 days post last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of changes from baseline in nutritional status associated with long-term dosing of ALN-TTR02
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 56 days post last dose

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Previously received and tolerated ALN-TTR02 in Study ALN-TTR02-002.
- Adequate Karnofsky performance status, liver function, and renal function.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant or nursing.
- Has had a liver transplant.
- Has a New York Heart Association heart failure classification >2.
- Has unstable angina.
- Has uncontrolled clinically significant cardiac arrhythmia.

overall_contact.last_name: Contact: Alnylam Clinical Trials Hotline. Call for Complete Site List.
